'''Dr. Wiener''' is [[Emma]]'s pediatrician in "[[The One With The Pediatrician]]" (he is not the titular doctor, however). He drops [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] after Rachel constantly calls him and his wife (including at night) over little problems with Emma.

[[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] can't help but laugh every time he hears his name.

Dr. Weiner is never shown.
